resources.string:
"Indore Connect helps you to finds local service, or any information, or other details of Indore.

Our Goal is to provide complete or very small information to you, or we are more focusing on daily needs services, which information are not getting easily online, for that you have to search in your local area, we planning to connect them to you.

Our vision to provide complete details of indore as soon as possible, that will not take much time, it’s our priority to provide our service to all of you.

Hope we can fulfill all your requirements.

Thanks,
IC Team.
"
We need to update everyday, so we want changes or need correction in our application.
So, suggest us what you think, or what update you need in our application, to make APP more intresting or friendly. Thanks
